section.name: status and plans
section.p: This page contains information about the current state of the distribution and future plans.

Jaret timebars are developed using java 1.5. The SWT version has a higher priority than the swing version. In fact the last changes have not been done for the swing version as you can observe when reading the changelog.

ul.li: Development and testing is done using win xp. Mac OSX and Linux (GTK) tested: working, see additional documentation for details.
The viewer for Swing will not catch up with the swt version until after 1.0.
possibly support for variable row heights (since 1.12)
check Swing version gets near to the 1.0 SWT (is in fact quite near)
check the paperclips library for enhanced print support (checked, nice library, no time)
